languages.text: "Проклятая плоть, ты предаешь меня, я вязну в трясине из мяса и жил, но дух мой стремится к совершенству Машины!"
"Accursed flesh, you betray me, I am drowning in the mire of flesh and sinew, but my spirit longs for the perfection of the Machine!"
languages.original_text: "Проклятая плоть, ты предаешь меня, я вязну в трясине из мяса и жил, но дух мой стремится к совершенству Машины!"

traits.locale_text: "Accursed flesh, you betray me, I am drowning in the mire of flesh and sinew, but my spirit longs for the perfection of the Machine!"
"Accursed flesh, you betray me, I am drowning in the mire of flesh and sinew, but my spirit longs for the perfection of the Machine!"
"Accursed flesh, you betray me, I am drowning in the mire of flesh and sinew, but my spirit longs for the perfection of the Machine!"
"Accursed flesh, you betray me, I am drowning in the mire of flesh and sinew, but my spirit longs for the perfection of the Machine!"
"Accursed flesh, you betray me, I am drowning in the mire of flesh and sinew, but my spirit longs for the perfection of the Machine!"

languages.text: «Maldita carne traicionera. Me ahogo en la ciénaga de tendones y carne, ¡mas mi espíritu anhela la perfección de la Máquina!».
languages.original_text: "Accursed flesh, you betray me, I am drowning in the mire of flesh and sinew, but my spirit longs for the perfection of the Machine!"

traits.locale_text: «Maldita carne traicionera. Me ahogo en la ciénaga de tendones y carne, ¡mas mi espíritu anhela la perfección de la Máquina!».

languages.text: “被诅咒的肉体啊，你背叛了我！我被困在血肉与筋腱的泥沼中，但我的精神渴望变得像机械一样完美！”
languages.original_text: "Accursed flesh, you betray me, I am drowning in the mire of flesh and sinew, but my spirit longs for the perfection of the Machine!"

traits.locale_text: “被诅咒的肉体啊，你背叛了我！我被困在血肉与筋腱的泥沼中，但我的精神渴望变得像机械一样完美！”

languages.text: 「忌まわしい肉め、私を裏切りおって…肉と筋の沼に溺れているが、私の魂は完璧な機械を望んでいるのだ！」
languages.original_text: "Accursed flesh, you betray me, I am drowning in the mire of flesh and sinew, but my spirit longs for the perfection of the Machine!"

traits.locale_text: 「忌まわしい肉め、私を裏切りおって…肉と筋の沼に溺れているが、私の魂は完璧な機械を望んでいるのだ！」

languages.text: "Verfluchtes Fleisch, du verrätst mich. Ich ertrinke im Morast aus Fleisch und Sehnen, doch mein Geist lechzt nach der Perfektion der Maschine!"
languages.original_text: "Accursed flesh, you betray me, I am drowning in the mire of flesh and sinew, but my spirit longs for the perfection of the Machine!"

traits.locale_text: "Verfluchtes Fleisch, du verrätst mich. Ich ertrinke im Morast aus Fleisch und Sehnen, doch mein Geist lechzt nach der Perfektion der Maschine!"

languages.text: « Maudite chair, tu me trahis. Je me noie dans ce bourbier de chair et de tendons, alors que mon esprit rêve de la perfection de la Machine ! »
languages.original_text: "Accursed flesh, you betray me, I am drowning in the mire of flesh and sinew, but my spirit longs for the perfection of the Machine!"

traits.locale_text: « Maudite chair, tu me trahis. Je me noie dans ce bourbier de chair et de tendons, alors que mon esprit rêve de la perfection de la Machine ! »

languages.text: "Et olacak melanet, bana hıyanet ediyor. Et ve sinir içinde boğulup gidiyorum. Ruhumsa Makine'nin mükemmeliyetini arzuluyor!"
languages.original_text: "Accursed flesh, you betray me, I am drowning in the mire of flesh and sinew, but my spirit longs for the perfection of the Machine!"

traits.locale_text: "Et olacak melanet, bana hıyanet ediyor. Et ve sinir içinde boğulup gidiyorum. Ruhumsa Makine'nin mükemmeliyetini arzuluyor!"
